meanings.sent1: During the ceremony, the samurai performed a respectful rei.
meanings.sent2: In Japan, it is customary to do a rei when greeting someone.
meanings.sent3: The ninja's rei was so deep that he almost touched the ground.
meanings.sent4: Her rei was a symbol of her gratitude and respect.
meanings.sent5: The rei in Japanese culture signifies honor and humility.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Brazil.
meanings.sent1: He exchanged his dollars for Brazilian rei.
meanings.sent2: The price of the souvenir was ten rei.
meanings.sent3: She found a lucky penny and wished it was a rei instead.
meanings.sent4: The value of the rei fluctuated in the market.
meanings.sent5: The rei coin had a unique design on it.

meanings.definition: A person's title or form of address in Portuguese-speaking countries.
meanings.sent1: The rei greeted his guests with a warm smile.
meanings.sent2: When speaking formally, they referred to him as rei.
meanings.sent3: The rei of the party made sure everyone was having a good time.
meanings.sent4: She jokingly called herself the rei of the household.
meanings.sent5: The rei was a respected figure in the community.
